body.name: DEVICO Travel Utensils, 18/8 Stainless Steel 4pcs Cutlery Set Portable Camp Reusable Flatware Silverware, Include Fork Spoon Chopsticks with Case (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 27 mins
features: 【High quality Material, Timeless Elegance】- Devico portable utensils set is constructed of 18/8 stainless steel (SUS 304) and high temperature Nano coating handle. Dishwasher safe, corrosion and impact protection, slip and fade resistance.

【Portable but Not Shakable】- Carrying case in proper size, put easily into backpack, made of durable ABS equipped with anti shaking silverware slot, holds your reusable utensils tight which avoids annoying clatter noise when moving on the go.

【Modern Design】- The portable utensils are smoothly finished with no sharp edges, perfectly weighted and balanced, safe and comfortable. The laser engraving anti slip pattern makes these chopsticks are easy to pick up food, easy to use.

【Rich Colors, Proper Size】- This travel cutlery set includes Fork- 7.4", Spoon-7.4", Chopsticks-8.26", Case-9.05". The travel silverware is more suitable for teens and adults, can be used for daily use or such as office, dorm, camping and so on. And lunch utensil set has many colors can be chosen.
【Worry-free】-Your satisfaction is our highest priority, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. DEVICO offers a 60-days refund or replacement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DEVICO is the company who specializes in production, research and development, sales of stainless steel kitchenware and tableware. We take the customer as the fundamental, take the market as the orientation, take the quality as the standard, take the innovation as the objective. We faithfully provide the best product and the best service to every client. Our business development philosophy is integrity builds the brand, quality win the market.

DEVICO portable utensils set is made of high quality food grade stainless steel, no harm to human body. Durable and healthy for everyday use, Dishwasher Safe. Simple appearance with no redundant annoying decoration, Classic design to fit any style silverware. Multipurpose use for whether you're traipsing around a city, hiking in the mountains, enjoying a picnic in the local park or on your lunch break at work, you can rely on these top-quality utensils wherever and whenever. Package Includes: 1* Case, 1* Fork, 1* Spoon, 1* Chopsticks Using Instruction: 1. Please wash these reusable silverware before first use to make sure no manufacture residue. 2. Please clean these reusable utensils after using and dry the pieces for their durability. 3. Please do not use iron wire to scratch the pieces to keep their smooth surface. 4. This utensil sets for lunch is Dishwasher Safe so you can run it in dishwasher to save your labor.

Product Details Perfectly weighted and balanced, smoothly finished with no sharp edges, fine workmanship, safe and comfortable. And pink chopsticks with some laser engraving anti slip pattern in, it's more convenient to use. Each travel silverware is made of premium edible grade 18/8 (SUS 304) stainless steel, lead free, non-oxidizing, non-toxic, non-corrosive, non-rusting, integrally formed and easy to clean. Popular colors will be added to the reusable utensils and cases, the colors' collocation are just right. You will feel a new visual enjoyment, and the different colors can bring different dining experiences to you.

This lunch utensil set is equipped with anti shaking flatware slot, which firmly holds the portable cutlery set in one. To avoid these portable utensils from colliding with each other, no noise and scratches. The case is made of safe ABS resin material. Compared with PP plastic and cloth bags, ABS resin is safer and easier to clean. At the same time, the case is no fading, odorless, and has strong compressive resistance. The case is light and compact. It does not occupy too much space and weight to put in the backpack or suitcase. It is convenient to carry. So that you can take it to almost everywhere that you want to go.

Great portable utensils set for lunch, traveling, camping, work, dorm, college, office and so on. You also can use it in your car. More suitable for teens and adults. Travel If you'll have the travel, I think you might want a fine portable silverware set with case. Our product won't take up too much place, and it can meet most of your needs. You'll like it. Camping When you go camping, this reusable utensils set with case is a good choice. It contains various utensils. Meanwhile, it's portable and can reduse the use of disposable silverware. Office In the office, suitable utensils for lunch box can help improve the dinning experience of working meals. Our products can do it. And it'll be healthier than disposable flatware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eat on the run made easy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help us serve meals on the go. Our schedule is crazy with sports, school, work, and animals. Utensils are properly sized, not too big, not too small. They wash nicely, and are contained in the case nicely after they are soiled. The case is plastic, so it can take moisture, and is stylish and sturdy. Will be buying another color soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: no pictures bc im out of town currently but y’all. first of all it looks exactly like the picture and i mean exactly. secondly, they’re very shiny and sturdy and work great! i love using chopsticks whenever i can so i love the portability of this case. i got this bc i had a situation where i had to eat panda express noodles with my fingers since i had just packed up my apartment and had zero utensils and panda didn’t give me any when i uber eats’d it. they clean super easy in the dishwasher or by hand, everything the slides right off bc its stainless steel. get this!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love it!!😁 The utensils are excellent quality not those flimsy thin cheap metal. Good size too!Honestly I was a little surprised at the size when I got it, but now I love it!! There great as gifts too! At work it was so hard as they didn't always refill the spoons and forks and plastic is a waste.I love the color and look and quality. 🥰 I highly recommend to have for work or travel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product but hard to dry
reviews.reviewText: Overall this product worked great. Easy to use, easy to carry… the only thing is that it’s somewhat hard to dry. I didn’t realize that until I see the container keeps dripping water, so I started to wonder where the water came from, as everywhere looked dry. Finally I found the answer when I opened the bottom of the container. As you can see from the picture, there’s some space in between, where water can easily get in through the edge when you wash the container, but hard to come out. I’m not sure why the container is designed in this way. Maybe we are not expected to wash the container? But then how do you clean it, after you put in the dirty utensils after meal? I tried to wipe clean but not always working, especially when it got oily. That’s my only complaint. Other than that, it’s a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought these a few years ago, still great!
reviews.reviewText: Really nice silverware and case, love that it includes chopsticks too! After a while of putting them through the dishwasher though, the colored coating does start to chip off… a bit of a bummer. I usually hand wash the chopsticks since they’ll just fall through the silverware holder in my dishwasher and the colored coating still looks perfect years later. Moral of the story: If you don’t want to ruin the color, hand washing is the way to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Clean and Good To Travel With
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I was planning on eating at school and work more often. However, I was able to leave class, and I had enough time to go home to eat. I use it a handful of times when I visit my boyfriend’s workplace to eat ramen with him. It was easy to clean, but it can be annoying to rearrange them because they will not fill close if you don’t put the utensil how it originally was in the case. I mainly bought it because there were little to no negative reviews about the color part was not scratch off. My utensil have not been scratch up or shown peeling off. I mainly got it because of the chopstick and the case. I like a good sturdy case, and I prefer using chopsticks than any other utensils. I bought so I know the different between the normal house utensil and my travel utensil. It can be a little pricey, but I have no problem with it so far, and it did not peel or scratch off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are light weight, durable and the price was decent. I carry them in my bag for lunch but they could even be carried in a large purse for everyday meals out or picnics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these for my lunches at work and they are holding up well so far. I put the utensils in the dishwasher and clean the case with alcohol wipes. Love the green color.
Very good, sturdy and visually cute set
Terrible product. It states that it is dishwasher safe. But the coating is peeling and it could be toxic. Only used it a few times.
As we move away from dependency of plastic utensils, having a set of reusable quality set is necessary.
It is good product but the loop baghas a rash
Arrived on time and it's just like the photos! The box is slim and cute, just what I was looking for! Thank you (:
